details.jobDescription: We are seeking a talented and motivated UI/UX Designer to join our team. Core responsibilities include user interaction design, based on research and analysis in order to communicate design motivations/decisions to various stakeholders. Must have strong skills in Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.
